Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE9.name: prestyled()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE9.abstract: Convert string to attributed string by looking for embeded tag and find sutable patterns.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE1.name: prestyledBy(rule:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE1.abstract: Convert string to attributed string by using provided rule pattern.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE1.name: prestyledBy(styles:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9PrestylerE1.abstract: Convert string to attributed string by using provided styles.

Extensions/String.html.name: String
Extensions/String.html.abstract: Prestyler uses a public extension to provide access to string formatting. Next methods can be used for every string.

Enums/Prestyle.html.name: Prestyle
Enums/Prestyle.html.abstract: This enumeration can be used to describe Rule styles.

Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.name: init(_:)
Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.abstract: Initialize new Precolor with provided string color in hex format. For example #234 or #5463ff

Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.name: forBackgound()
Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.abstract: Precolor will effect to background text color instead of foreground.

Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.name: random(_:)
Classes/Precolor.html#/s:9Prestyler8Prec.abstract: Set percent which defines how much random color should effect original color.

Classes/Prestyler.html#/s:9PrestylerAAC1.name: defineRule(_:_:)
Classes/Prestyler.html#/s:9PrestylerAAC1.abstract: Defines new rule using patters and styles to apply.

Classes/Prestyler.html.name: Prestyler
Classes/Prestyler.html.abstract: Prestyler provides static methods to manage rules.

Classes/Precolor.html.name: Precolor
Classes/Precolor.html.abstract: Precolor helps to manage color information for Rule styles. By using precolor you can define background and foreground text colors, and also make some interesting effects.
